message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $105?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still a bit short on budget, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $107. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $102?

Hi Bob, I understand you're really close to making a decision, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $105. I think that's the best compromise we can reach. If you're willing to meet me at $105, I'll sell the product to you.
